remarks: An element covered by the lattice unit, when joined with an atom not under it, equals the lattice unit.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-2012.)
statement:
1cvrjat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
1cvrjat.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
1cvrjat.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
1cvrjat.u $e |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) $.
1cvrjat.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
1cvrjat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
1cvrjat $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) /\ ( X C .1. /\ -. P .<_ X ) ) -> ( X .\/ P ) = .1. ) $.
